comment: Tried the app for the first time and is really good. How do I edit the distance that I've ran?

author: Dennis Petersen
comment: Best app ever endomondo dose not even come close

author: les grot
comment: I used to have it on my previous smartphone but my code does not work on new phone.  There are better ups there now. Demo version kept on hunging up. The interface is not ergonomoc e.g. try to name a training after you recorded it. You can but not where you first look in. Try to switch it off. Cant belive i paid $30 and i can not use it on my new device. You are greedy.

author: Ann Cleverley
comment: I love it, can use my garmin hrm strap with this app, listen to music and guided coaching on my Sony ultra and so have sold my beloved garmin 910 XT as it does everything that did and more.  Check out their website. Brilliant after care too.
title: SO MUCH DETAIL

title: Poor

author: Ch Bo
comment: Easy to use, keeps track of many activities, but I do wish more activities counted towards ranking , with a heart rate monitor you know calories are burning. IE treadmill , exercise bike.  I only paid for the app once in 4 years and have gone through like 5 phones.
title: Excellent app

author: A Google User
comment: I agree that the user interface is a bit strange.  But I use it for the most detailed stats among all the running apps on the market.  Please add night mode. It's very hard on the eyes in the dark.
title: The best

comment: It's full featured unlike those free apps. Tracks everything about your workout. Upload to site. Plan routs on site. Every thing works perfectly. Syncs H.R. w/ zephyr H.R. monitor
title: I have been using this app for years

author: A Google User
comment: Seems like an old system, and its not very user friendly. And it keeps locking up, it would be great if those things werent an issue

author: A Google User
comment: Awefull old fasioned design from Windows Mobile legacy. buggy live traking. showed correct location on phone, but 1000's km off on live web page.

author: A Google User
comment: Very high GPS delusion on SGS2. It is nearly impossible to track your sports activities on this device. Without better GPS I will never buy this app

author: A Google User
comment: By far the most professional sport app with maps , online services. Look forward for more , get this app then.

author: A Google User
comment: Ran this on winmo for a while, happy to see it for Android. Works great. Evo.

comment: Very buggy. Throws a write error when trying to exit the app on my Droid Charge and refuses to exit; have to force close to shutdown.

comment: Works well on nexus one with zephyr heart monitoring belt over bluetooth. Can use bluetooth headset at the same time.

author: A Google User
comment: Ugly interface

author: Yiannis Makris
comment: Have been using it since the start on a windows phone many years now. Amazing idea and extremely usefull piece of software. UI needs a serious overhaull since it is based still on the initial launch but Iam sure it will come. Excellent support and continious improvements ftom the developers. Best money spend on software I got back every cent from its use. Keep on guys!
title: Long time user

author: David Bayly
comment: I've owned this app since Windows Mobile days. And while it's had its ups and downs in the past, it has matured into the best bicycling app available--by a country mile! Together with the Run.GPS web site, this app collects more data and allows more granularity in analysis than anything else out there. I'm surprised that it's not used more in the United States. When it cost $40, I understood its lack of popularity. No longer. If you want to analyze your riding, this is the best app available.
title: Best, bar none...

author: Sheena O'Connell
comment: Can't close the app. When I tried closing it through various methods it started talking and wouldn't shut up
title: Why won't it stop

Nowdays graphics need to be modernized since screens also impoved dramaticaly. Maybe to also be able to configure your own screen layout ??!
